meanings.definition: A person of the same age or generation as another.
meanings.sent1: My friend and I are coaevals, born in the same year.
meanings.sent2: The classmates in our group project are all coaevals.
meanings.sent3: It's always fun to hang out with my coaevals at the school reunion.
meanings.sent4: In this club, we treat everyone as coaevals, regardless of their background.
meanings.sent5: Growing up together, we have always been coaevals and shared similar experiences.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The coaevals events of the festival made it a memorable weekend.
meanings.sent2: The coaevals trends in fashion show how styles come back around.
meanings.sent3: It was a strange coincidence to have two coaevals meetings scheduled back-to-back.
meanings.sent4: The coaevals celebrations in the city created a lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The coaevals technology advancements are shaping the future of communication.
